description: This request for bid is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category(ies) of the SA: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems, Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products, Wood Veneer – Freestanding Products.
full_summary:
***Furniture Procurement for Ottawa***
======================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-79-96073722
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **Solicitation Number:** CIC-157465
* **Publication Date:** 2023-12-22
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-08T15:00:00
* **Status:** Expired (Expired means that the bidding process has now ended and a decision has been made.)

### Procurement Overview

* **Category:** Goods and Services
* **Description:** The government is seeking bids for office furniture procurement in Ottawa.
* **Products:** Bidders are expected to provide products under the following categories:
	+ Office and desk accessories
	+ Furniture
	+ Freestanding storage
* **Required Products:** 
	+ Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems
	+ Freestanding height-adjustable desk/table products
	+ Wood veneer – freestanding products

### Key Dates and Timeline

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-22
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-28
* **Tender Closes:** 2024-01-08T15:00:00 (Closing means that the bidding process has ended, and no more bids will be accepted after this time.)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Steven French
* **Contact Email:** IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** 613-293-2493

### Trade Agreements and Eligibility

* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Eligibility:** Suppliers must be general stream suppliers under the PGA (Public Gathering Agreement)

**Tender Documentation:**

* **Bid Proposal Document:** Request for bid-cic-157465.pdf
* **Questions and Answers (Q&A) Document:** cic-157465-qa-round-1---1er-round-qr.pdf
* **Notice of Proposed Procurement:** notice-of-proposed-procurement-157465_0.pdf

### Important Notes

* This procurement is for a national capital region (NCR), and the products must be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario.
* The products must be in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
